snippet.title: Rippin' Riders Snowboarding / Cool Boarders Burrrn Japanese Commercial
snippet.description:
Highly prolific on the PlayStation 1, Cool Boarders took a sudden Dreamcast (And Neo Geo Pocket) detour before briefly returning to Mt. Sony. Did the series wipe out for good?

Visit chrislovesjapan.com for more content.

My transcription of the audio:
やっぱ、夏だって、スノーボードでしょうハハへ！
Cool Boarders Burrrn!
